title: Here’s the Key to Fighting Back Against Big Tech (Ep 1368)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the big tech tyrants doubling down on their wars on free speech. We have an option to fight back, and you must hear about it. I also address the Democrat’s ridiculous arguments in the Amy Coney Barrett hearings. 

News Picks:

Are the big tech titans breaking campaign finance laws? 


Democrats get an unpleasant surprise on the Amy Coney Barrett hearing.

Joe Biden’s cognitive decline was on display yesterday.

The better Sweden does in battling the coronavirus, the angrier they get. 


Tik Tokkers try to sabotage Trump tally and hilariously fail! 


The FBI’s own spreadsheet documents the uselessness of the Steele dossier. 

The NBA ratings are in a historic collapse. Get woke, go broke. 


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
